title: Honor level
body:
I was just wondering
When the honor levels reset at the start of the season
Does unhonorable etc also reset to lvl 2?
Or do they stay the same?

replies.body: We don't have any information currently about Honor levels in the next season.  Stay tuned on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page or [PB Boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)should any updates come up!
